data.text:
This is a list of references for Aviation English course and test developers, researchers, teachers, and examiners.

If you wish to be notified of new additions to this list, please subscribe to this blog via e-mail (see box on the right).

If you would like me to add a reference, please leave it as a comment below, preferably in APA. Similarly, let me know if you spot any problems. Please note, however, that the links are but a bonus. Like hearts, they’re easily and often broken. It is impossible for me to keep track of the many changes on third-party websites, but you can always look for the references you want with your search engine of choice.

Last updated on February 4, 2022.

With the help of ERAU’s LHUFT bibliography.
